title: Tim Hartwell and the Brutus of Troy: (The Guildhall Edition)
description: "A clever story, set in a place of mystery, myth, and leaving the reader waiting for more!"
"The Duke and Duchess of Cambridge have asked me to thank you most sincerely for the selection of books you have written"
"Prince Harry has asked me to thank you for 'Tim Hartwell and The Brutus of Troy'.
is the author of the #1 Fantasy best-selling

. He was visiting Vienna, Austria one year when he was inspired with the idea to write fantasy books for young adults after so much tourism in a beautiful Western city. Middleton writes science fiction for older audiences, and is also interested in scriptwriting, animation film, and 3D filmmaking, alongside millions of records sold as a multi-platinum producer.
